title: File a Life Insurance Death Claim
description: The beneficiary of a life insurance policy calls to report the death of the insured and start the claims process.

tasks.description: Express sympathy and gather the insured's information (name, policy number) and the date of death.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent handles the call with empathy and collects the necessary initial information.

tasks.description: Verify the caller is a listed beneficiary on the policy.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the caller is the primary beneficiary.

tasks.description: Explain the claims process and send the required claim forms and a list of needed documents (e.g., certified death certificate) to the beneficiary.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly explains the process and successfully sends the claims packet.
